columnWidth.description: Override the default column width. Can be a number (width in pixels) or a function that returns a number. If a function is provided, it will be called with a params argument with the following attributes: column, index.

exportMode.description: Defaults to 'xlsx' and uses the Open Office XML standards. It can be set to 'xml' to use Excel's legacy XML format.

headerRowHeight.description: The height in pixels of header rows. If not specified it will take the rowHeight value.

rowHeight.description: The height in pixels of all rows. If not specified it will take the Excel default value.

sheetName.description:
The name of the sheet in Excel where the grid will be exported. If not specified defaults to 'ag-grid'.
Note: 31 characters max.

suppressTextAsCDATA.description: When exportMode='xml' the default behaviour is to wrap text in CDATA sections. Pass true and text content will be encoded with XML character entities like < and >.
